articles.title: Explained: Who was Alluri Sitharama Raju, whose statue PM Modi unveiled?
articles.description: In June this year, Home Minister Amit Shah named Alluri as one of the prominent leaders from the area, along with Ramji Gaur and Kumaram Bhim, as those who stood against the Nizams for the liberation of Telangana.

articles.title: 12 Dead as School Bus Falls Into Gorge in Kullu, PM Modi Announces Compensation
articles.description: Twelve people, including some schoolchildren, have been killed as a private bus fell into a gorge in Himachal Pradesh's Kullu district.
articles.content:
At least 12 people, including schoolchildren, died as a private bus fell into a gorge in Himachal Pradesh's Kullu district at around 8 am on Monday, 4 July.
